reviews.review_msg: She's kind, caring, and wants the best for all of her students. She has great lectures and is even flexible with deadlines. She is accessible outside of class and really tries to help her students. Sometimes, the grading can be vague but overall your writing will definitely improve!

Sandie is an amazing prof who genuinely cares about her students. Very flexible with deadlines and is understanding of the pressure students are under during this pandemic. She gives very clear feedback on writing assignments and is extremely helpful when asking for clarification.
